summary: In 1943, an American fishing boat has a fateful encounter with a seriously damaged Danish schooner off of Canada's Atlantic coast.
cast: Dana Andrews|Carla Balenda|Claude Rains|Philip Dorn|Onslow Stevens|Skip Homeier|Eric Feldary|J.M. O'Brien|Jimmy Ogg|George Ovey|Ned Roberts|Henry Rowland|John Royce|Carl Sklover|Bob Smitts|Brick Sullivan|David Thursby|Bess Wade|William Yetter Jr.
director: Director: Alfred L. Werker (as Alfred Werker)
title: Sealed Cargo
